[vc_row gap=”35″ equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1600075164912{background-image: url(https://proppertee.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/leaf.png?id=5990) !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}” el_id=”leaf”][vc_column][g5plus_heading title=”WELCOME TO SAMRIDHI LUXURIYA AVENUE” text_align=”text-center”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text]

2 & 3 BHK Luxury Residences in Sector 150 Noida Expressway

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text]

COMFORT WRAPPED IN LUXURY

Another masterpiece from Samridhi Group – The Promoters of Samridhi Grand Avenue

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text]

LUXURY THAT DELIGHTS

Samridhi Luxuriya Avenue in Noida sector 150 is a luxurious residential project by Samridhi Group. This residential project in noida offers an unparalleled lifestyle in one of the highly coveted localities in NCR. Samridhi Luxuriya Avenue is fully equipped with dynamism, exuberance and enthralling construction will stand tall adding joy to those living in it and inviting envious glances of those staying elsewhere. Designed by a world-renowned architectural firm and constructed by a reputed engineering company, thus, it can be said that the Samridhi Luxuriya Avenue is one of the best ongoing projects in noida 150 which is ready to rewrite the saga of a lifestyle that’s filled with unparalleled splendour..

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1600074844485{padding-top: 50px !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”5978″ img_size=”large” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_outline”][vc_column_text]

PURE COMFORT
Lifestyle that’s enviable, filling your
life with total bliss.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”5979″ img_size=”large” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_outline”][vc_column_text]

LUXURY INTERIORS
Every corner exudes in luxury, a class
that’s truly extraordinary

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”5980″ img_size=”large” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_outline”][vc_column_text]

CLASSY SPECIFICATIONS
It’s not just your home but the surroundings too
that will never seize to delight you.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”5981″ img_size=”large” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_outline”][vc_column_text]

UNMATCHED LOCATION
One of the finest locations in NCR and
epitome of fine living.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”5983″ img_size=”large” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_outline”][vc_column_text]

WORLD-CLASS AMENITIES
The finest of international lifestyle, heralding
a world that’s simply superb.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”5984″ img_size=”large” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_outline”][vc_column_text]

FITNESS CENTRE
Lead a healthy life, filled with and activities in
its international fitness centre.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”5985″ img_size=”large” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_outline”][vc_column_text]

PREMIUM SPORTS CENTRE
Taking care of the playful side of life, there never
will be a dull moment.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”5986″ img_size=”large” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_outline”][vc_column_text]

LUXURY SPA
You will look forward to it after a hectic and to
while away time doing nothing.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”5987″ img_size=”large” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_outline”][vc_column_text]

RECREATIONAL FACILITIES
Abundant joy and lots of happy
moments, yes that’s what awaits you here.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
